name: bsi-second-opinion-mcp
description: MCP server for consulting GPT-4.1 and Gemini 2.0 Flash for coding second opinions within Claude Code sessions.

tools.name: ask_gpt
tools.description: Send a coding question to OpenAI GPT-4.1 and get a second opinion. Include optional context and code snippets for better analysis.

question.description: The coding question or problem you want GPT to analyze

context.description: Optional background context about your project, constraints, or goals

code.description: Optional code snippet to analyze or review

tools.name: ask_gemini
tools.description: Send a coding question to Google Gemini 2.0 Flash and get a second opinion. Include optional context and code snippets for better analysis.

question.description: The coding question or problem you want Gemini to analyze

context.description: Optional background context about your project, constraints, or goals

code.description: Optional code snippet to analyze or review

tools.name: compare_opinions
tools.description: Send the same coding question to both GPT-4.1 and Gemini 2.0 Flash, returning their responses side-by-side for comparison. Useful for getting diverse perspectives on complex decisions.

question.description: The coding question or problem you want both models to analyze

context.description: Optional background context about your project, constraints, or goals

code.description: Optional code snippet to analyze or review
